page.title: 01GAZETEER
page.content: This area is roughly divided into 3 parts-{farmland}to the{north}, {housing and industrial }to the {south. The most recent developments are the {Swift Valley}and{Glebe Farm}industrial estates,both of which are still are still expanding. The {Brownsover}housing estate started in the 70's still expands and will further grow in the 80's. {The GEC}dominates the area,giving employment for many parts of the town, and exports turbines all over the world. { Other features}include the River Avon,local schools,and railway station.
